name: Winter Gifts
description:
A game made for the LOWREZ game jam 2019. 

This is the second game I made :D,  took me five day ;(

##### Game Info #####

It's Winter time!! Craft gifts and deliver them to you friendly neighbours! Beware of the hairy creatures living in the forest, they will chase you if you approach them!

##### How To Play ##### 

Use arrow keys to navigate through the map.

Walk to signs and press x to read, c to close.

Press x to place down gift boxes(Must place then on the mat in front of houses to get a point).

Press c to enter and exit your OWN house.

Press c to shoot!

Walk to the crafting table in your house to craft gifts!

You will only get a point if you give gifts to SPECIFIC HOUSES! (Houses with a RED mat, not brown)

Shoot trees(trunks) to collect apple(gain energy and health), if you collected beehives, bees will sting you!! 

Enjoy.
